english.segment1: I love You Lord. I worship You Lord, always. So thankful Lord - You saved my life. You saved my life today
english.segment2: Let me be a shining light for You. Let me be a joy to You always. Let me be a shining light for You. Let me be a joy to You always
english.segment3: No superman. I'm no hero. I'm just a man in Your eyes. But through Your son I've overcome. The father of all lies
